sect2.title: Introduction
sect2.para: The additional case details page shows all custom fields of a case by clicking on "Show details" link in case details.
You can customize this page for each case by providing a relative URL to case.

listitem.para: Create a new additional case details UI and a start process which will display the new UI.
Generate a relative URL from start process which created in step 1.
Store the URL in "CUSTOMIZATION_ADDITIONAL_CASE_DETAILS_PAGE" additional property of case.
